title: Update admin credentials in backend

requirements.text: Update the hardcoded admin credentials in the backend actor (backend/main.mo). Set the admin username to 'STSHubsachin' and the admin password to 'success@#2003'. Ensure the login() function validates against these new credentials and returns a valid session token on success.

quotes: Please update the backend code with these new credentials: Username:STSHubsachin and Password: success@#2003

acceptanceCriteria: Calling login('STSHubsachin', 'success@#2003') returns a valid session token.
Calling login() with the old credentials returns an error.
Calling login() with any incorrect username or password still returns an error.
validateSession() and all admin-guarded functions continue to work correctly with tokens issued after the credential update.

constraints: Do not change any other backend logic, data models, or existing CRUD functions.
Do not expose the new credentials anywhere in the frontend code or logs.
nonGoals: Adding a dynamic password-change UI or API.
Hashing or encrypting the stored password (unless already implemented).
